name: Basketball Tournament
description: Basketball tournament will be conducted in Meraz this year for all the college and university students in chhattisgarh. Assemble your 7 players squad to compete with the best teams this year.

name: FUTSAL
description: Do you have a passion for Futsal and want to have a adrenaline rush by competing with the best !. This is the right platform for you and your team to showcase your team spirit, skills and strength under the umbrella of Meraz 5.0 in IIT Bhilai
